An activation email has been sent to

ERRORS.ERROR_1: Your email was not registered. Please sign up before email activation.
ERRORS.ERROR_2: Your email has already been verified. Please sign in

FORM_REQUEST_SUCCESS.TEXT: Thank you! Your message has been sent, we will contact you by Email.

GHOST_USER.TEXT:
Please sign in/sign up to add the contract
to your personal account

GHOST_BUY_TOKENS.TEXT: Please sign in/sign up to replenish your account

PROMO_ACTIVATED.TEXT:
Promo code was activated.
New price: {{price}} WISH.

NEO_CROWDSALE_FINALIZE_ERR.TEXT:

after {{stopDate|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}} only.

LOG_OUT.TEXT: Do you really want to Log Out?

CONTRACT_DELETE.TEXT: Do you want to remove it?

CREATE_CONTRACT_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: The list of smart contracts is empty

TWO_FACTOR_AUTH.TITLE: Two-factor authentication
TWO_FACTOR_AUTH.DESCRIPTION: We strongly recommend you to Enable 2FA

LIST_STEPS.STEP_2: Add mywish app in your Google Authenticator or in similar app
LIST_STEPS.STEP_3: Use code every time when login to MyWish

BLOCKCHAIN_BLOCK.TITLE: Choose Blockchain
BLOCKCHAIN_BLOCK.TEST_NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: Free of charge - for testing your contract before paying for it

CROWDSALE.TITLE: Crowdsale contract
CROWDSALE.DESCRIPTION: Start your ICO/Token sale with a few clicks

TOKEN.TITLE: Token contract
TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Create a Token and distribute it yourself or with a Crowdsale Contract

AIRDROP.TITLE: Airdrop
AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: Distribute any ERC-20/ERC-223 tokens among many addresses (for example, after Bounty program or Crowdsale)

INVESTMENT_POOL.TITLE: Investment pool
INVESTMENT_POOL.DESCRIPTION: The contract for ETH accumulation before the investment. Create it and share the address with others.

LOST_KEY.TITLE: Lost key
LOST_KEY.DESCRIPTION: The smart contract has all the same features as the standard Ethereum wallet and, in addition, redirecting your funds to the backup wallet, if you will lose the access/private key.

DEFERRED.TITLE: Deferred payment
DEFERRED.DESCRIPTION: Smart contract makes payment on a specified date.

WILL.TITLE: Will contract
WILL.DESCRIPTION: Setup the transfer of funds to family or friends, in case of long inactive period of time (death, accidents & so on).

WEDDING.TITLE: Wedding contract
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION: Wallet with Multisig function & distribution of funds between the owners after/during specified period of time.

LIST.LIST_ITEM_1: Contracts in Test Net are free for use (you can create & deploy it to test network)
LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: Please accept low speed for deployment (up to 3 hours)
LIST.LIST_ITEM_3: Contracts in Test/ Main network have identical code
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: Please use Test Net addresses (Ropsten for ETH) while working with contracts

LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_2: Choose Will contract & set it up. MyWish generates your personal smart contract.
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_3: Make a payment & MyWish deploys the contract to the RSK network.
LIST_1.LIST_ITEM_4: Smart contract is deployed & ready for execution.

LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_1: User regularly calls the contract to confirm its’ "live" status.
LIST_2.LIST_ITEM_2: If no confirmation during the specified timeframe is detected, the contract distributes the funds to heirs.

EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.TITLE: External Developers
EXTERNAL_DEVELOPERS.DESCRIPTION: To add your contract to the MyWish library and start audit process, fill the form below.

NOTE.TEXT: After replenish you will be not able to transfer/exchange tokens. You can use it only for contracts creation inside the Platform

BTC_ATTENTION.TEXT:
You will receive tokens after 5 BTC blocks confirmation.
The approximate time of the transaction is 1 hour.

LIST.LIST_ITEM_2: Choose Send Ether & Tokens tab in your wallet
LIST.LIST_ITEM_4: Enter Amount to Send and choose ETH or WISH
LIST.LIST_ITEM_7: Confirm the payment by pressing the button "DONE"

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding addresses & amount of tokens you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one address in Ethereum (column A) and amount of tokens to distribute (column B)
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_TEXT: There are 2 types of the format for amount of tokens field. For example, your token has 18 decimals and you want to send 26.5 tokens to somebody. If you choose “No Decimals” you need to put 26.5 to column B. “With Decimals” - 26500000000000000000 (26.5 * 10^18).

TABLE.SUCCESS_ADDRESSES: The following addresses are ready to be whitelisted for Crowdsale contract:

ERRORS.WRONG_AMOUNT_FORMAT: Missed or wrong amount of tokens
ERRORS.WRONG_AMOUNT_VALUE: Wrong amount of tokens - decimals contradiction

DISCLAIMER.ITEM_1: For adding whitelisted addresses you need to upload the table in *.csv format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_2: Every row must contain one address in Ethereum format
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_3: Only the first 100 addresses will be processed
DISCLAIMER.ITEM_4:
You can add as many addresses as you need, but not more than 100 at a time
Table example:

TABLE.SUCCESS_ADDRESSES: The following addresses are ready to be whitelisted for Crowdsale contract:

MINT_TOKENS_FORM.DESCRIPTION: Define address for tokens (after minting it will be sent to this address)

ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet
ADDRESS.LABEL: Address

CHANGE_DATES_FORM.SET_NEW_DATES: You can set new dates for start & finish. Start date can't be changed after Sale start and for contracts with time bonuses.

LESS_BALANCE.TEXT: Not enough tokens for contract deployment

FREEZE_DATE.TEXT:
Un-Freeze date for token is expired.
Please change it & Try again.

CONTRACT_START_DATE.TEXT:
Contract's start date is incorrect.
Please change it & Try again.

LIST.ITEM_1: For sale activation you need to transfer token ownership to crowdsale contract.
LIST.ITEM_2: You will need to make the special transaction from token owner address ({{address}})

LIST.ITEM_0: After finalization no more tokens can be minted, no new crowdsales can be created

LIST.ITEM_1: MyWish is NOT responsible for the use of the contract
LIST.ITEM_2: MyWish is ONLY responsible for creation & launch it on Ethereum/RSK network
LIST.ITEM_3: MyWish is NOT responsible for incorrect contract behaviour in case of wrong parameters entered by users
LIST.ITEM_4: MyWish is NOT responsible for errors in the code, but will do everything to eliminate it asap if they are detected
LIST.ITEM_5: MyWish does NOT have access to the management functions of the contract and will not be able to stop it, continue and do anything else, except of finalisation after end date

LIST.ITEM_1: Due to high deployment costs, you need to contact support@mywish.io before the creation in Main Net

LIST.ITEM_0: If you don’t then funds will be distributed in accordance with the contract.

WILL_CANCEL.TITLE: Cancel
WILL_CANCEL.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure to cancel contract?

LIST.ITEM_0: After cancellation all funds will be sent to your management address.
Are you sure to withdraw? All funds will be sent to your management address.

ANY_TRANSACTION.PART_1: Send transaction ({{amount||'0'}} ETH) from your management address

ACTIVATE.TITLE: Activate
ACTIVATE.DESCRIPTION: To Activate the crowdsale you need to transfer token ownership to crowdsale contract. Please call the corresponding function from token owner address.

WHITELIST.TITLE: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION:
To add all addresses as whitelisted to Crowdsale contract please do the following transaction
(if you add many addresses it will require a lot of gas):

AIRDROP.DESCRIPTION: To send tokens to addresses {{from}} - {{to}} please do the following steps (if you added many addresses it will take a lot of gas):

CANCEL.TITLE: Cancel
CANCEL.DESCRIPTION: To stop the contract, follow the steps in the instruction.

DEPOSIT.TITLE: Deposit
DEPOSIT.DESCRIPTION: To make a deposit on the contract, follow the instructions.
DEPOSIT.AIRDROP_DESCRIPTION: To make a deposit of {{coinName}} tokens to Airdrop contract, please do the following steps:

FINALIZE.TITLE: Finalize
FINALIZE.DESCRIPTION: To Finalize the contract and make tokens transferable do the following steps (under investment address)

I_ALIVE.DESCRIPTION: To Confirm your live status please do the following:

MINT_FINALIZE.DESCRIPTION: To finalize Token {{token_short_name}} please make the following transaction from token owner's address ({{admin_address}})

PARITY.TITLE: Add to parity
PARITY.DESCRIPTION: Add a contract the Lost key in Parity

LIST.ITEM_2: Enter Settings and click the Contracts checkbox.
LIST.ITEM_3: Go to folder "Contracts" and click "+ WATCH"
LIST.ITEM_4: In the "Choose contract type" choose "Custom contracts".
LIST.ITEM_5: In the "Network address" field, enter the Management add-on (your Wallet address)
LIST.ITEM_5_1: Specify the name of the contract (the name that you specified in MyWish service is recommended )
LIST.ITEM_5_3: Copy ABI contract from MyWish instruction
LIST.ITEM_7: Now this contract is available to you in the list of contracts and you can transfer funds from it.

WILL_CANCEL.DESCRIPTION:

CHANGE_DATES.DESCRIPTION: To change start date to {{newStartDate|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}} / finish date to {{newFinishDate|date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'}} please do the following steps:

DEPOSIT.TITLE: Deposit
DEPOSIT.DESCRIPTION: After you create the contract you need to send funds to it.

LIST.ITEM_1: Send your BTC to generated address (it’s unique):
LIST.ITEM_2: After getting BTC it will be sent to RSK network from MyWish whitelisted address.
LIST.ITEM_3: In 3-6 hours (10 BTC confirmations are needed) your RSK contract balance will be credited (1 BTC = 1 RSK) and you will get email confirmation.
LIST.ITEM_4: If your BTC address has been whitelisted by RSK Community you can send SBTC to contract {{contract_address}} directly.

ENTER_PROMO_BLOCK.DESCRIPTION: You can enter promo code and get a discount

WEDDING.TITLE: Wedding contract
WEDDING.DESCRIPTION: Please fill the form below and specify your wishes. We will ask contact of your partner before contract creation.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

SEND_TO_WALLET.LABEL: Send to wallet
SEND_TO_WALLET.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet
SEND_TO_WALLET.DESCRIPTION: Enter the recipient's ETH address. This address will get transfer.

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.LABEL: E-mail for notification
NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Enter e-mail address to which we send notification about transfer.

DATE_OF_TRANSFER.LABEL: Date of transfer
DATE_OF_TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: Enter the contract's conditions - specify when it will make the transfer.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address:
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.LABEL: Set Token
TOKEN_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.DESCRIPTION:
Specify the token which shall be distributed after the investment. Choose "Off" if you would like to set it later.
It CAN'T be changed after setting it up.

TOKEN_ADDR.LABEL: Token contract address:
TOKEN_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Specify the address of the token which you would like to distribute

HARD_CAP.LABEL: Pool volume (maximum)
HARD_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines maximum volume for the pool. After reaching maximum no more contributions to pool are accepted.

SOFT_CAP.LABEL: Pool volume (minimum)
SOFT_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines minimum ETH needed for investments. If minimum is not reached - contributors get their ETHs back. You can set it to 0 (no minimum).

START_DATE.LABEL: Start date
START_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Start date/time for opening the pool. No contributions to the pool will be accepted before that time

FINISH_DATE.LABEL: Finish date
FINISH_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Finish date/time for closing the pool. No contributions to the pool will be accepted after that time.

CHANGING_DATES.LABEL: Changing dates
CHANGING_DATES.DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish Dates can be changed manually after Contract Deployment. You can prolong sale or finish it early.
Otherwise, dates are hardcoded and can`t be changed.

WHITELIST.LABEL: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION: Contract will accept the contributions from defined addresses only. You can add addresses at any moment.

MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Min & Max investments limitations
MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: You can specify minimum/maximum accepted contributions (in ETH). For example, accept contributions from 0.05 ETH to 3000 ETH only

MIN_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Minimum
MIN_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Minimum amount accepted. "0" = No minimum limitation

MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Maximum
MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum amount accepted. it can not be higher hard cap

INVESTMENT_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.LABEL: Set Destination
INVESTMENT_ADDRESS_ON_OFF.DESCRIPTION:
Set Destination for the investments. Choose "Off" if you would like to set it later.
It CAN'T be changed after setting it up.

INVESTMENT_ADDRESS.LABEL: Destination address:
INVESTMENT_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: ETH address for sending all funds from the pool. It can be Contract address. Double check it before the submission.

BONUS.LABEL: Personal bonus (in Tokens) for the pool's owner:
BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-1%. % of pool's tokens (after successfull investment) will be sent to pool's owner.

HARD_CAP_INVEST.LABEL: Everyone after MAX
HARD_CAP_INVEST.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can initiate investment after MAX reaching. Off - only contract's owner can do it.

SOFT_CAP_INVEST.LABEL: Everyone after MIN
SOFT_CAP_INVEST.DESCRIPTION: Everyone can initiate investment after MIN reaching. Off - only contract's owner can do it.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

RESERVE_ADDRESS.LABEL: Reserve address
RESERVE_ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet
RESERVE_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: Specify the backup address to which you want to send funds in the event that a private key is lost from the management address

SHARE.LABEL: Share
SHARE.DESCRIPTION: You can divide the funds between several reserve accounts. Choose percentage for every reserve address.

NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.LABEL: E-mail for notification
NOTIFICATION_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Enter the e-mail address to which you want to send a message about transferring the crypto currency

FIELDS.CONDITIONS_TEXT: Enter Conditions for the wallet's activity
FIELDS.CONDITIONS_DESCRIPTION: Enter the contract's conditions - specify when it will make the transfer.

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.ETH_DESCRIPTION: ETH address (not exchange address). This address will manage the will contract. Double check the address (and access to it) before submission
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.RSK_DESCRIPTION: This address will manage your contract. You can create it by Jaxx wallet. Double check it before submission.

YOUR_EMAIL.LABEL: Your Email for remainder & notifications
YOUR_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: We will remind you to confirm "live" status & send notifications about the contract

BENEFICIARY_ADDR.LABEL: Beneficiary address
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.ETH_DESCRIPTION: Enter ETH address of beneficiary. After contract execution funds will be sent to that address.
BENEFICIARY_ADDR.RSK_DESCRIPTION: Enter RSK address of beneficiary. After contract execution funds will be sent to that address. Heir can create it by jaxx too.

BENEFICIARY_EMAIL.LABEL: E-mail for notification
BENEFICIARY_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: Enter e-mail address to which we send notification about transfer

FIELDS.CONDITIONS_TITLE: Define how often you want to confirm your "Live" status

CONFIRMATION_EVERY.LABEL: Confirmation transaction every
CONFIRMATION_EVERY.DESCRIPTION: You will need to send transaction to the contract from management address every time.

CONTRACT_EXPIRATION.LABEL: Will contract expiration
CONTRACT_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: After due date all funds will be send to management address if all confirmations received at time.

CANCEL_VIA_MYWISH.LABEL: Cancel contract via MyWish
CANCEL_VIA_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: If "On" you will be able to Cancel the contract and get all funds back by 1-Click on MyWish.

CONFIRM_LIVE_VIA_MYWISH.LABEL: Confirm "Live" via MyWish
CONFIRM_LIVE_VIA_MYWISH.DESCRIPTION: If "On" you will be able to Confirm "Live" status by 1-Click on MyWish.

BOTH_VIA_MYWISH_TEXT.DESCRIPTION: Off mode for both options are more secured, but less convenient for use. You will need to install Metamask for management the contract. On options give you ability to manage the contract by MyWish.

TOKEN_NAME.LABEL: Token name:
TOKEN_NAME.DESCRIPTION: Enter name of the project without spaces, usually 5-25 symbols. Lower and uppercase can be used

TOKEN_SYMBOL.LABEL: Token symbol:
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION: Usually 3-4 Letters like ETH, BTC, NEO, WISH etc.. Please check that it’s unique before submission (https://etherscan.com/tokens)
TOKEN_SYMBOL.DESCRIPTION_NEO: This symbol SHOULD be short (3-8 characters is recommended), with no whitespace characters or new-lines and SHOULD be limited to the uppercase latin alphabet (i.e. the 26 letters used in English)

DECIMALS.LABEL: Decimals:
DECIMALS.DESCRIPTION: Defines the number of decimals for the token. 0-{{max_decimals}} numerals are accepted. {{default_decimals}} as common practice

TOKEN_TYPE.LABEL: Choose Type of Token
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_1: ERC-20 is recommended option. Accepted by the most exchanges.
TOKEN_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_2: ERC-223 is almost the same as ERC-20. Provides extra safety during token transfers.

TOKEN_OWNER.LABEL: Token Owner
TOKEN_OWNER.DESCRIPTION: {{blockchain}} address (not exchange address). This address will be owner of the token (after sale end date). Double check the address (and access to it) before submission

RECIPIENT.TITLE: Define address for tokens (after minting it will be sent to this address)
RECIPIENT.DESCRIPTION_BLOCK: You can reserve the tokens for Team, Bonuses, Bounties - these tokens will be created, but can’t be sold until token sale completion

RECIPIENT_ADDRESS.LABEL: Address
RECIPIENT_ADDRESS.PLACEHOLDER: Enter the address of the recipient's wallet

FUTURE_MINTING.LABEL: Future Minting:
FUTURE_MINTING.DESCRIPTION:
Yes - you can create more tokens in the future & use token for Crowdsale.
No - no more tokens will be created in the future. Crowdsale is impossible.
FUTURE_MINTING.DESCRIPTION_NEO:
Yes - you can create more tokens in the future.
No - no more tokens will be created in the future.

CROWD_SALE.TITLE: Crowdsale contract

CAP_NOTE.TITLE: Please note!
CAP_NOTE.TEXT:
If softcap > 0 all investments are stored on the vault contract until the end of crowdsale.
If you need to get investments on your address right away set softcap = 0.

CROWD_SALE.CHART_TOKEN_DISTRIBUTED_MESSAGE: Max possible emission of tokens, no more tokens can be minted.

CHOOSE_TOKEN.LABEL: Choose token

ERRORS.CLOSED: You can't use this token. Final sale is already completed
ERRORS.RUNNING: You can't use this token until the previous sale is not completed

CHOOSE_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION: Create New Token or Choose existing one if you've already completed presale on MyWish platform
CHOOSE_TOKEN.DISTRIBUTED_DESCRIPTION: Shows how many tokens you have already distributed during pre-sale rounds (incl. reserved tokens for Team, Bounty, Bonuses if any)

CROWD_SALE_TYPE.LABEL: Choose Type of Crowdsale
CROWD_SALE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_1: You can make as many pre-sale rounds as you want
CROWD_SALE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION_2: No sale is possible after final sale. No more tokens can be created after end date

STORAGE_ADDRESS.LABEL: Investments Storage Address
STORAGE_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: ETH address (not exchange address). All contributions will be sent to that address after finish date if soft cap is reached. Double check the address before entering it

TOKEN_RATE.LABEL: Token rate
TOKEN_RATE.DESCRIPTION: Defines the rate of your token. 1-100000 numerals are accepted. Usually 500-5000 tokens per 1 {{blockchain}}

HARD_CAP.LABEL: Hard cap tokens
HARD_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines how many tokens can be sold. After reaching this number sale will be stopped automatically. 1-100,000,000,000,000 Numerals are accepted.

SOFT_CAP.LABEL: Soft cap tokens
SOFT_CAP.DESCRIPTION: Defines the minimum number of tokens that needs to be sold for the project continuation. If soft cap is not reached - contributors get their vestments back, project gets nothing. You can set it to 0 (no soft cap)

START_DATE.LABEL: Start date
START_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Start date/time for sale. No contributions will be accepted before that time

FINISH_DATE.LABEL: Finish date
FINISH_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Finish date/time. No contributions will be accepted after the set time. Can be finished before if hard cap is reached

TRANSFERABLE.LABEL: Transferable:
TRANSFERABLE.DESCRIPTION: User can limit transfer of tokens from Contributors until token completion to reduce the speculations. Off is recommended

AUTO_FINALIZE.LABEL: Finalize auto:
AUTO_FINALIZE.DESCRIPTION: Our system can finalize the contract (to make tokens transferable) automatically after end date (you can do it early if hard cap reached)

CHANGING_DATES.LABEL: Changing dates
CHANGING_DATES.DESCRIPTION:
Start/Finish Dates can be changed manually after Contract Deployment. You can prolong sale or finish it early.
Otherwise, dates are hardcoded and can`t be changed.

WHITELIST.LABEL: Whitelist
WHITELIST.DESCRIPTION: Contract will accept the contributions from defined addresses only. You can add addresses at any moment.

MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Min & Max investments limitations
MIN_MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: You can specify minimum/maximum accepted contributions (in ETH). For example, accept contributions from 0.05 ETH to 3000 ETH only

MIN_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Minimum
MIN_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Minimum amount accepted. "0" = No minimum limitation

MAX_INVESTMENTS.LABEL: Maximum
MAX_INVESTMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Maximum amount accepted. it can not be higher hard cap

TIME_BONUS.LABEL: Bonus
TIME_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-100%.  How many extra tokens will be sent to contributor.

FIELDS.TIME_BONUS_TITLE: Please choose one of the options (or both) for bonus activation

DEPENDS_AMOUNT.LABEL: Depends on amount of sold tokens:
DEPENDS_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Specify how many tokens shall be sold before bonus activation and when bonus deactivated

DEPENDS_DATE_TIME.LABEL: Depends on date/time:
DEPENDS_DATE_TIME.DESCRIPTION: Specify the time frame when bonus is active for everyone

FIELDS.TIME_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: You can define bonus depending on amount of sold tokens and time. For example, give extra 10% to the first week contributors

AMOUNT_BONUS.LABEL: Bonus
AMOUNT_BONUS.DESCRIPTION: Usually 0.1-100%.  How many extra tokens will be sent to contributor.

MIN_AMOUNT.LABEL: Min Amount
MIN_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Minimum contribution for getting specified bonus

MAX_AMOUNT.LABEL: Max Amount
MAX_AMOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Maximum contribution for getting specified bonus{{last ? ' (you can left it empty if there is no limit)' : ''}}

FIELDS.AMOUNT_BONUS_DESCRIPTION: You can define bonus depending on contribution Amount. For example, give extra 5% tokens for 10+ ETH contributions

MANAGEMENT_ADDR.LABEL: Management address
MANAGEMENT_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Owner of this address will be able to manage the contract (it's the only one)

TOKEN_ADDR.LABEL: Token contract address
TOKEN_ADDR.DESCRIPTION: Specify the address of the token which you would like to distribute

PREVIEW.FREE_VERSION_MSG: In free version (Test Net) sources codes are not available for loading.
PREVIEW.DEFERRED_SOURCE_CODE: Your Deferred payment contract source code
PREVIEW.ETHERSCAN_VERIFY_SUPPORT: If you need to verify contract on Etherscan please contact us by email
PREVIEW.ETHERSCAN_VERIFY_SUPPORT_OR_FOLLOW: If you need to verify contract on Etherscan please contact us by email or follow the instruction:
PREVIEW.LIBRARIES_AND_FILES: Libraries & other files can be found here

VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_1: Open contract address on etherscan
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_2: In Contract Code tab choose "Verify And Publish"
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_7_1: Remove the parameters from the Constructor Arguments field ABI-encoded
VERIFY_INSTRUCTION.ITEM_8: Others fields are not required. Press "Verify And Publish"

CONFIRM_LIVE.VARIANT_1:
